```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import kv, kve
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> kv(3, 1000.), kve(3, 1000.)
(0.0, 0.03980696128440973) 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(0., 5., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, kve(i, x), label=f'$K_{i!r}(z)\cdot e^z$')
>>> ax.legend()
>>> ax.set_xlabel(r"$z$")
>>> ax.set_ylim(0, 4)
>>> ax.set_xlim(0, 5)
>>> plt.show() 
```
